      • addBodyBlockAfter

        public void addBodyBlockAfter​(Block block,
                              Block existingBlock)
        1) Add the given block after the given existing block 2) And push all others inside the body 3) And make all the parents' gap sizes bigger.

        If existing block is null add the given block at the start of the body

      • isPositionOn

        public boolean isPositionOn​(int x,
                            int y)
        Is the given position on this statement block. This method is overridden bcs statementblocks should only be clicked on their upper part (conditionWidth).
